home.metaDescription: Archway offers premium interior design services that transform spaces into functional and beautiful environments.
home.heroSubtitle: Creating beautiful and functional interiors for homes and businesses
home.aboutSubtitle: We combine creativity, functionality, and sustainability to design spaces that tell your story
home.customizationDesc: Every design is tailored to reflect your unique style, needs, and budget
home.qualityDesc: We source the finest materials and partner with trusted craftsmen for exceptional results
home.efficiencyDesc: Our streamlined process ensures your project is completed on time and within budget
home.timelyDesc: We respect deadlines and ensure your project is completed when promised
home.servicesSubtitle: We offer a comprehensive range of interior design services to meet your every need
home.residentialDesc: Transform your home into a personalized sanctuary that reflects your style and meets your needs
home.commercialDesc: Create functional and inspiring workspaces that enhance productivity and impress clients
home.visualizationDesc: Experience your design before construction with realistic 3D renders and virtual walkthroughs
home.projectsSubtitle: Explore some of our recent work and get inspired for your next project
home.ctaSectionSubtitle: Contact us today to schedule a consultation and take the first step toward your dream interior
home.fallbackProject1Desc: A contemporary design with clean lines and functional spaces for urban living
home.fallbackProject2Desc: Elegant interior with custom furniture and sophisticated details for a luxury lifestyle
home.fallbackProject3Desc: Productive and inspiring workspace designed for collaboration and creativity
home.description: This is the placeholder homepage for the Archway Innovations interior design platform.

about.pageDescription: Learn about Archway Innovations, our mission, vision, and the team behind our interior design expertise.
about.title: Transforming Spaces, Enhancing Lives
about.subtitle: We're a team of passionate designers dedicated to creating exceptional interior spaces that reflect your personality and lifestyle.
about.missionText: To create innovative interior designs that balance aesthetics, functionality, and sustainability while exceeding client expectations.
about.visionText: To be the leading interior design firm in Egypt, recognized for our exceptional designs and sustainable practices that enhance quality of life.
about.teamMember1Bio: Over 10 years of experience in interior design, specializing in residential spaces.
about.teamMember2Bio: Ensures all projects are delivered on time and within budget while maintaining the highest quality standards.
about.teamMember3Bio: Transforms design concepts into stunning 3D visualizations that help clients envision their future spaces.
about.testimonial1Quote: Working with Archway Innovations was exceptional. Their attention to detail and understanding of our needs was outstanding.
about.testimonial2Quote: Archway team delivered an office space design that perfectly balances functionality and aesthetics.
about.testimonial3Quote: Our retail space needed to reflect our brand identity, and Archway Innovations delivered beyond our expectations.
about.value1Text: We constantly strive for excellence in every project, with meticulous attention to detail and delivery of the highest quality standards.
about.value2Text: We believe in the power of innovative ideas and creative solutions to transform spaces into unique and inspiring environments.
about.value3Text: We are committed to implementing sustainable practices and using eco-friendly materials in our designs for a healthier future.
about.value4Text: We work closely with our clients, listening to their needs and preferences to create spaces that reflect their vision.
about.cannotFind: Explore our frequently asked questions to learn more about our services and process.

descriptions.interior-design: Comprehensive interior design that combines functionality and aesthetics to transform your space into an ideal environment.
descriptions.interior-architecture: Specialized interior engineering solutions to reimagine and enhance your spaces.
descriptions.3d-visualization: See your project before construction begins through realistic 3D visualizations.
descriptions.furniture-design: Custom furniture designs that combine elegance, comfort, and practical functions.
descriptions.lighting-design: Innovative lighting solutions to enhance the atmosphere and function in your space.
descriptions.renovation: Comprehensive renovation services to renew your home or workspace.
descriptions.madinaty: Modern designs in Madinaty that combine comfort and elegance

descriptions.madinaty-villa: Luxury villa design in Madinaty featuring elegant interior design, open living spaces, and distinctive finishing touches that blend comfort with sophisticated aesthetics.
descriptions.urban-apartment: Compact apartment design that maximizes space and functionality in urban environments with smart storage solutions and multifunctional furniture.
descriptions.office-renovation: Professional workspace designed for productivity and collaboration with comfortable solutions, ideal lighting, and flexible meeting areas.
descriptions.madinaty: Distinctive interior designs for Madinaty homes that reflect contemporary lifestyle with elegant touches
